item.title: Japan's Toyota, hurt by President Trump's tariffs, reports a drop in profit
item.description: Toyota has reported a 7% drop in profit for April to September

item.title: World shares retreat after losses for Big Tech pull US stocks lower
item.description: Shares in Europe and Asia have retreated following a broad decline on Wall Street spurred by selling of Big Tech shares

item.title: Trump tariffs face Supreme Court test in trillion-dollar test of executive power

item.title: Trump heads to Miami to speak about his economic agenda
item.description: President Donald Trump is heading to Miami, speaking on the anniversary of his reelection to a second term

item.title: Massive fireball erupts as UPS plane crashes at Kentucky airport, leaving 7 dead
item.description: At least seven people are dead and 11 injured after UPS plane crashed in Kentucky
